Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
#Kingmaker Nearby Allies have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier Nearby Allies have +10 Fortification
#ES calculation for AG with flesh crafter (20% chaos res) Minions gain 40% of life as extra maximum energy shieldMinion have 40% life gained as extra energy shield
